snippet: Three soldiers were killed in the operation, which was a major breakthrough in a battle that has paralyzed an important southern city for more than a week.
lead_paragraph: Three soldiers were killed in the operation, which was a major breakthrough in a battle that has paralyzed an important southern city for more than a week.

headline.main: Philippine Forces Free Scores Held by Muslim Rebels
